main_definition: Gamespot is a popular online video game review and news website that provides information about various video games, including reviews, ratings, and gaming tips.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Online platform for video game reviews
meanings_and_examples.example: I read a detailed review of the new Super Mario game on Gamespot.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Source of gaming news and updates
meanings_and_examples.example: Gamespot announced an upcoming E3 event with details about new games to be revealed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Provider of video game ratings and scores
meanings_and_examples.example: The GameSpot rating for the latest Call of Duty was 9.2 out of 10.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used to refer to a gamer who frequently visits or follows Gamespot's content
meanings_and_examples.example: As an avid gamer, he checks Gamespot regularly for the latest news and updates in the gaming world.
